operations.notes:
The Venue Type lookup returns all Venue Types defined for the forum with which the calling User is associated.

This operation returns a Venue Type Wrapper value with the following attributes:

Field NameData TypeDescription
venueTypes List of Venue Type elements. All Venue Types defined for this forum.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
The Lookup service retrieves the name and Sysid of every data value of the type provided as the Lookup Type in the path parameter argument. Using this information, the actual data object may be retrieved from other end point services. The path parameter for the lookup-type must be one of the following values:

Lookup Type
BusinessUnit
ContactType
Department
LocatorImageType
ResourceAttributeType
ResourceIdentityType
Role
Title

The return value array is a collection of Code Table Data results.

Example Usage

The following example describes how to retrieve an array of lookup values for Business Units

  /aq-api/lookups/BusinessUnit
